# save()

**Instance Method**

Saves all the changes made since the last save.

## Declaration

```swift
func save() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if successful or there were no changes; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Saving and Detecting Changes

- **hasUnsavedChanges()**: Indicates whether an address book has changes that have not been saved to the Address Book database.
- **saveAndReturnError()**: Saves all the changes made since the last save.
